    Verbal

  • Speaking
  • Yelling/Loud noises
  • Grunts, groans, etc.
  • Involves listening to each other
  • Primary mode of communication

    Non-Verbal

  • Body Language
  • Situational Behavior
  • Facial Expressions
  • Eye Contact
  • Apparel/Dress
  • Communicates ideas effectively
  • Expresses emotion
  • Connects individuals on a deep level
  • Conveys cultural info about the communicator
